text: Glyn Idris Jones (27 April 1931 â€” 2 April 2014) was a South African actor, writer and director. Jones wrote some scripts and had some minor roles in Doctor Who. On 4 April 2014, it was announced on Jones had died on 2 April. This blog was Jones' official blog, linked to from his official website . ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:South African actors Category:Television actors Category:Television directors Category:Television writers
